name: Pickthall
text: When the event befalleth -

name: Pickthall
text: There is no denying that it will befall -

name: Pickthall
text: Abasing (some), exalting (others);

name: Pickthall
text: When the earth is shaken with a shock

name: Pickthall
text: And the hills are ground to powder

name: Pickthall
text: So that they become a scattered dust,

name: Pickthall
text: And ye will be three kinds:

name: Pickthall
text: (First) those on the right hand; what of those on the right hand?

name: Pickthall
text: And (then) those on the left hand; what of those on the left hand?

name: Pickthall
text: And the foremost in the race, the foremost in the race:

name: Pickthall
text: Those are they who will be brought nigh

name: Pickthall
text: In gardens of delight;

name: Pickthall
text: A multitude of those of old

name: Pickthall
text: And a few of those of later time.

name: Pickthall
text: On lined couches,

name: Pickthall
text: Reclining therein face to face.

name: Pickthall
text: There wait on them immortal youths

name: Pickthall
text: With bowls and ewers and a cup from a pure spring

name: Pickthall
text: Wherefrom they get no aching of the head nor any madness,

name: Pickthall
text: And fruit that they prefer

name: Pickthall
text: And flesh of fowls that they desire.

name: Pickthall
text: And (there are) fair ones with wide, lovely eyes,

name: Pickthall
text: Like unto hidden pearls,

name: Pickthall
text: Reward for what they used to do.

name: Pickthall
text: There hear they no vain speaking nor recrimination

name: Pickthall
text: (Naught) but the saying: Peace, (and again) Peace.

name: Pickthall
text: And those on the right hand; what of those on the right hand?

name: Pickthall
text: Among thornless lote-trees

name: Pickthall
text: And clustered plantains,

name: Pickthall
text: And spreading shade,

name: Pickthall
text: And water gushing,

name: Pickthall
text: And fruit in plenty

name: Pickthall
text: Neither out of reach nor yet forbidden,

name: Pickthall
text: And raised couches;

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! We have created them a (new) creation

name: Pickthall
text: And made them virgins,

name: Pickthall
text: Lovers, friends,

name: Pickthall
text: For those on the right hand;

name: Pickthall
text: A multitude of those of old

name: Pickthall
text: And a multitude of those of later time.

name: Pickthall
text: And those on the left hand: What of those on the left hand?

name: Pickthall
text: In scorching wind and scalding water

name: Pickthall
text: And shadow of black smoke,

name: Pickthall
text: Neither cool nor refreshing.

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! heretofore they were effete with luxury

name: Pickthall
text: And used to persist in the awful sin.

name: Pickthall
text: And they used to say: When we are dead and have become dust and bones, shall we then, forsooth, be raised again,

name: Pickthall
text: And also our forefathers?

name: Pickthall
text: Say (unto them, O Muhammad): Lo! those of old and those of later time

name: Pickthall
text: Will all be brought together to the tryst of an appointed day.

name: Pickthall
text: Then lo! ye, the erring, the deniers,

name: Pickthall
text: Ye verily will eat of a tree called Zaqqum

name: Pickthall
text: And will fill your bellies therewith;

name: Pickthall
text: And thereon ye will drink of boiling water,

name: Pickthall
text: Drinking even as the camel drinketh.

name: Pickthall
text: This will be their welcome on the Day of Judgment.

name: Pickthall
text: We created you. Will ye then admit the truth?

name: Pickthall
text: Have ye seen that which ye emit?

name: Pickthall
text: Do ye create it or are We the Creator?

name: Pickthall
text: We mete out death among you, and We are not to be outrun,

name: Pickthall
text: That We may transfigure you and make you what ye know not.

name: Pickthall
text: And verily ye know the first creation. Why, then, do ye not reflect?

name: Pickthall
text: Have ye seen that which ye cultivate?

name: Pickthall
text: Is it ye who foster it, or are We the Fosterer?

name: Pickthall
text: If We willed, We verily could make it chaff, then would ye cease not to exclaim:

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! we are laden with debt!

name: Pickthall
text: Nay, but we are deprived!

name: Pickthall
text: Have ye observed the water which ye drink?

name: Pickthall
text: Is it ye who shed it from the raincloud, or are We the Shedder?

name: Pickthall
text: If We willed We verily could make it bitter. Why then, give ye not thanks?

name: Pickthall
text: Have ye observed the fire which ye strike out;

name: Pickthall
text: Was it ye who made the tree thereof to grow, or were We the grower?

name: Pickthall
text: We, even We, appointed it a memorial and a comfort for the dwellers in the wilderness.

name: Pickthall
text: Therefor (O Muhammad), praise the name of thy Lord, the Tremendous.

name: Pickthall
text: Nay, I swear by the places of the stars -

name: Pickthall
text: And lo! that verily is a tremendous oath, if ye but knew -

name: Pickthall
text: That (this) is indeed a noble Qur'an

name: Pickthall
text: In a Book kept hidden

name: Pickthall
text: Which none toucheth save the purified,

name: Pickthall
text: A revelation from the Lord of the Worlds.

name: Pickthall
text: Is it this Statement that ye scorn,

name: Pickthall
text: And make denial thereof your livelihood?

name: Pickthall
text: Why, then, when (the soul) cometh up to the throat (of the dying)

name: Pickthall
text: And ye are at that moment looking

name: Pickthall
text: - And We are nearer unto him than ye are, but ye see not -

name: Pickthall
text: Why then, if ye are not in bondage (unto Us),

name: Pickthall
text: Do ye not force it back, if ye are truthful?

name: Pickthall
text: Thus if he is of those brought nigh,

name: Pickthall
text: Then breath of life, and plenty, and a Garden of delight.

name: Pickthall
text: And if he is of those on the right hand,

name: Pickthall
text: Then (the greeting) "Peace be unto thee" from those on the right hand.

name: Pickthall
text: But if he is of the rejecters, the erring,

name: Pickthall
text: Then the welcome will be boiling water

name: Pickthall
text: And roasting at hell-fire.

name: Pickthall
text: Lo! this is certain truth.

name: Pickthall
text: Therefor (O Muhammad) praise the name of thy Lord, the Tremendous.
